settings.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.text: Find answers to common questions about our products, shipping, and wellness journey.

settings.question: Are your products made from natural materials?
settings.answer: Yes! All Prakriti Essentials products are crafted using natural, eco-friendly materials that are safe for your skin and the environment.

settings.question: How long do the products typically last?
settings.answer: With proper care, our products are designed to last 2-3 years of regular use. Each product comes with specific care instructions.

settings.question: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.answer: Yes! We offer free shipping on all orders over ₹999. Orders below this amount have a flat shipping fee of ₹99.

settings.question: What's your return policy?
settings.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy on all unused products in original packaging. If you're not satisfied, we'll provide a full refund.

settings.heading: Still Have Questions?
settings.text: Our wellness experts are here to help
